_exec_summary.SummaryText:
JB PEARL SALES & SERVICE IS AN AGRICULTURAL RETAIL BUSINESS THAT SPECIALIZES IN SUPPLYING  THE NECESSARY INPUTS FOR GRAIN PRODUCTION.   THIS COMPANY STRIVES TO MAINTAIN A SAFE AND HEALTHY WORK PLACE.  THE OWNERS AND EMPLOYEES HAVE MADE EVERY EFFORT TO PLAN THE PREVENTION OF ANY ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.



OUR EMPLOYEES HAVE BEEN TRAINED IN THEIR RESPECTIVE EMERGENCY ACTIONS, INCLUDING THE EMERGENCY MEETING PLACE AND EACH OF THEIR INDIVIDUAL RESPONSIBILITIES REGARDING AN ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.



JB PEARL SALES AND SERVICE HAS MADE ARANGEMENTS WITH A REGIONAL CROP NUTRIENT FIRM TO MAKE A USABLE END PRODUCT FROM ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.  THE INBOUND AND OUTBOUND PRODUCT IS NOT OWNED BY JB PEARL.  NOR IS THE PROCESS OF MAKING THE END PRODUCT OWNED BY OUR FIRM.  WE ARE ONLY THE REAL ESTATE FOR THE T-REACTOR PROCESS.  HOWEVER, JB PEARL RECOGNIZES THE HAZARDS INVOLVED WITH ANHYDROUS AMMONIA AND UNDERSTANDS THAT IF A RELEASE WERE TO OCCUR IT IS OUR RESPONSIBILITY.



OUR EMPLOYEES ARE TRAINED IN SAFETY PROCEDURES, AND GENERAL KNOWLEDGE OF THE PROCESS THAT IS TAKING PLACE AT OUR FACILITY. THE EMPLOYEES ARE COMPETENCY TESTED OVER THE TRAINING MATERIAL.  PERSONS WORKING WITH ANHYDROUS AMMONIA ON OUR PREMISES ARE REQUIRED TO WEAR GOGGLES AND GLOVES DURING AMMONIA OPERATIONS AS WELL AS ALWAYS PROVIDING PLENTY OF EMERGENCY SAFETY WATER DURING HOSE COUPLING ACTIVITIES. MANAGEMENT OF THE T-REACTOR HAVE SUPPLIED US WITH DOCUMENTS RELATING TO INSPECTIONS AND TRAINING.



WITH THE ABOVE-MENTIONED TRAINING IN MIND, IT MAKES IT VERY EASY TO REPORT THAT ABSOLUTELY NO INJURY ACCIDENTS OR PROPERTY DAMAGE HAVE OCCURRED AT THIS FACILITY FOR THE PAST FIVE YEARS.



OUR EMERGENCY ACTION PLAN IS DESIGNED TO MINIMIZE THE RISKS TO EMPLOYEES, THE SURROUNDING PUBLIC AND THE AREA FIRST RESPONDERS.  JB PEARL PROVIDES TOURS FOR OUR LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT AND OUR ACTION PLAN HAS BEEN SHARED WITH THE COUNTY LOCAL EMERGENCY PLANNING COMMISSION (LEPC).  EACH OF OUR RESPONDING A
GENCIES ARE AWARE OF THE DANGEROUS NATURE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA AND THEY HAVE AGREED TO ASSIST US IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY OR ACCIDENTAL RELEASE.
